item.title: Restore the GraphDB
item.description: This guide shows you how to restore the Graph database in your Rhize environment. Prerequisites Before you start, ensure you have the following: The GraphDB helm chart A Database backup kubectl Optional: kubectx utilities kubectx to manage multiple clusters kubens to switch between and configure namespaces easily Optional: the k8 Lens IDE, if you prefer to manage Kubernetes graphically Steps Confirm the cluster and namespace are correct. ## context kubectl config current-context ## namespace kubectl get namespace Copy the tar file into the new Grafana Pod within the /var/lib/grafana/ directory.
